text: Ruliff Grass (August 10, 1921 – March 11, 2006) was a Canadian football player who played for the Toronto Argonauts. He won the Grey Cup with them in 1947.http://www.profootballarchives.com/1949irfutor.html Grass attended the University of Toronto. He later started a construction company.https://www.ogs.on.ca/ogspi/2006/06coc001.htm ==References== Category:1921 births Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario Category:Toronto Varsity Blues football players Category:2006 deaths
title: Rudy Grass
